results.summary: BottomNav.tsx analyzed via serena agent - NavItem interface (label, value, icon) and BottomNavProps (items, activeTab, onTabChange) documented. 7 key behaviors identified including mobile-only rendering, 5-item limit, accessibility features.

keyBehaviors: Safe area padding for notched devices

results.summary: useMediaQuery hook analyzed via explore agent - Breakpoints: mobile (<768px), tablet (768-1023px), desktop (>=1024px). 5 hooks exported: useMediaQuery, useIsMobile, useIsTablet, useIsDesktop, useBreakpoint.

output.implementation: Uses window.matchMedia() with event listeners and cleanup

discoveries.description: BottomNav is mobile-only (returns null on tablet/desktop) and synchronizes with Radix Tabs via shared activeTab state
Breakpoints follow Tailwind CSS conventions: 768px (md) and 1024px (lg)

context.criticalContext: Phase 1 parallel analysis complete. Both tasks executed via Task tool from parent agent (subagents cannot spawn other subagents). NavItem/BottomNavProps interfaces and breakpoint thresholds documented.
context.resumeInstructions: Phase 1 gate condition met. All analysis tasks complete. Ready for Phase 2 implementation if plan has additional phases.
warnings: Subagent nesting not supported - orchestration must be done from parent agent level

nextActions.action: Proceed to Phase 2 if implementation required
